mapper.select: select id, t_id, name, buy_price, sold_pric, earn_rate, used_date from share.last_best_tic_info where id = #{id}
select id, t_id, name, buy_price, sold_pric, earn_rate, used_date from share.last_best_tic_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into share.last_best_tic_info(t_id, name, buy_price, sold_pric, earn_rate, used_date) values (#{tId}, #{name}, #{buyPrice}, #{soldPric}, #{earnRate}, #{usedDate})

insert into share.last_best_tic_info(t_id, name, buy_price, sold_pric, earn_rate, used_date) values
(#{entity.tId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.buyPrice}, #{entity.soldPric}, #{entity.earnRate}, #{entity.usedDate})

insert into share.last_best_tic_info(t_id, name, buy_price, sold_pric, earn_rate, used_date) values
(#{entity.tId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.buyPrice}, #{entity.soldPric}, #{entity.earnRate}, #{entity.usedDate})
on duplicate key update t_id = values(t_id) , name = values(name) , buy_price = values(buy_price) , sold_pric = values(sold_pric) , earn_rate = values(earn_rate) , used_date = values(used_date)
mapper.update:
update share.last_best_tic_info
t_id = #{tId},
name = #{name},
buy_price = #{buyPrice},
sold_pric = #{soldPric},
earn_rate = #{earnRate},
used_date = #{usedDate},
where id = #{id}
